nodes.text: The Nexus was a trading outpost located above the planet Quarmendy. Early on in the Clone Wars, the Nexus was occupied by the Confederacy of Independent Systems under the leadership of Wat Tambor. In 22 BBY, the Nexus was the target of a Republic mission to seize control of the planet Quarmendy. During said mission, the Nexus was destroyed by Tambor after being cornered by members of Jedi Master Plo Koon's Wolfpack.
